Name: TV Producer term
Description: "TV Producer term" is a compound value type connecting a television producer to the TV series' produced, including information about the type of production role (e.g. "executive producer") and dates served.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The first date this person acted as this type of producer on this TV show.

Properties.Name: Producer
Properties.Description: The name of the producer of the TV program.

Properties.Name: Producer type
Properties.Description: The type or role of producer performed for this show. (Multiple types should be entered separately.)

Properties.Name: Program
Properties.Description: The title of the TV program produced.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The final date this person acted as this type of producer on this TV show.
